Key Match Events: 96th-MINUTE winner from Sadio Mane sealed victory with a 25-yard free-kick that curled around the wall and into the bottom corner of the net.
Post-Match Reflections: Ghana look set to miss a first continental finals since 2004 having managed a paltry two points from their four games, five adrift of the qualification positions with a difficult trip to pool leaders Angola next up.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Senegal had 30 attempts at goal against their hosts but it took until the final seconds for Mane to seal victory.
